featured_projects.name: InstantFeedback
featured_projects.description: An application for professors and mentors to see instant feedback given by students regarding their assignments.

featured_projects.name: PublishingReccomender
featured_projects.description: An end to end machine learning project using Cosine Similarity, TF-IDF Vectorizer, and Count Vectroizer to find the 'weird' articles. To request output(articles headings of the 'weird articles') from the rest endpoint
